Description.p: Describes the nature of the role played by an agent (in this case a pharmacy) when supplying medication.
Note:1) Message coding reflects the PDS code scheme for P1R2.
2) The role of Agent is a place holder, not an actual specified pharmacy

concept.displayName: Other (for example, nominated community pharmacy other than P2 or P3)
Other (for example, nominated community pharmacy other than P2 or P3)
